Description:
ARCHITECTURALLY DESIGNED WITH PICTURESQUE SETTING
Built from a steel frame and galvanised sheet, this idyllic lifestyle property set very close to the mighty Murray River is more than just a 'tin shed'. Designed to replicate the local orchard outbuildings, this stunning landmark piece is only 6 years old and truly hard to match. With a long list of features and a very secluded location, this family/entertainer's home will definitely impress.
1.8 ha - 4.5 Acres approx.
- 4 bedrooms (2 upstairs) and 2 bathrooms
- Open plan living area with huge cathedral ceiling
- Polished concrete floors with slab heating throughout
- North facing and fully insulated plus 4 split system air conditioners
- Stunning kitchen with island oak bench and Miele appliances
- Expansive outdoor deck ideal for entertaining
- Pristine native garden setting with lush rolling lawns
- Ornamental pear driveway Full irrigation system in gardens
- Reliable bore for garden water
- Double carport plus lock up workshop 3 phase power connected
- Secluded location only a few hundred meters from Murray River reserve
Insights: 27 Pullar Road, COBRAM VIC 3644 was last sold in 2014.

Description:
Rendered Four Bedroom Home
This rendered brick home was extended and renovated some time ago to accommodate a growing family. Features include a separate, formal lounge with a gas fire and a spacious kitchen/meals area with gas cooking and plenty of cupboards. There are four generous bedrooms, all with wardrobes, and main including an ensuite bathroom with spa bath. The family bathroom features a claw foot bath and lovely timber vanity. Solar electricity panels are installed to offset power costs. Double carport, sundry shedding and a good size yard complete the property.
Excellent opportunity for family or investment buyers!
Inspection available by appointment, or watch for open house times!

Description:
LARGE FAMILY HOME
Generous family home featuring 4 bedrooms and a study in near new condition. Featuring quality fixtures and fittings throughout, ducted cooling, ducted natural gas heating, formal lounge, living room, well appointed kitchen/meals area, main bedroom with full ensuite and spa bath. Double lockup garage with remote roller door and rear yard access, paved patio area, sprinkler system and good sized yard.
REPRESENTS VALUE FOR MONEY

Description:
One for the Renovator or First Home Buyer!
Positioned on a good sized corner block, this weatherboard home is looking for some love! Features include a spacious lounge with oil heater, original kitchen with meals area, three bedrooms, bathroom with bath and separate shower recess, laundry and separate toilet. Double length carport and vehicle access from both streets.
Great part of town ~ Renovate and reap the rewards!

Description:
Impressive Family Home ~ Murray River Estate
Top quality home, top quality build! This spacious four bedroom home is bound to impress!
~Electric kitchen with dishwasher, plenty of cupboards, loads of bench space and a walk in pantry,
~ Dining/family area with feature display wall and sliding door to entertaining area,
~ Separate theatre/rumpus room.
~ Four bedrooms, main with walk in robe and ensuite, and others with built in robes,
~ Formal lounge and separate study,
~ Tiled undercover BBQ/entertaining area with ceiling fan, and adjoining paved area with shade sail,
~ Zoned, ducted, reverse cycle split system air conditioning throughout, and
~ Double garage under roofline with direct house entry.
Landscaped, low maintenance surrounds and a great position close to River Road and Murray River bushland.

Popular Complex ~ "Oasis Village"

Address: 7 Lakeside Drive, Oasis Village Cobram VIC 3644
Description:
Oasis Village - Great One Bedroom Home!
Spacious single bedroom Oasis home well located in the village. Featuring open living area with gas heater, air conditioning and ceiling fan. Neat kitchen with gas stove and plenty of cupboards. Generous bedroom with B.I.R and bathroom with large shower recess. Double carport, lock up workshop and appealing outdoor patio area.
Village facilities include community hall, tennis court, swimming pool and park areas. Ideal retirement location. This unit with an excellent floor plan and plenty of storage space represents great value for money.
INSPECT TODAY
